item.title: HackTheBox :: Mango Write Up
item.description: This is a write-up of HackTheBox Mango. Contact me on Twitter (@ajdintrejic) if you have any questions Reconnaissance Let’s run nmap, sudo nmap -sV -sC -O -oA nmap/initial 10.10.10.162 We have to use https for this website on port 80, and we can get this “search page”. We can see some kind of analytics page in the top right corner. Getting user account I checked the /robots.txt, also ran gobuster, nothing useful there.
